descriptions:
['DescriptionExceptionally priced one of a kind, well maintained 3 bedroom Legacy large villa in the VIP District 6 of Jumeirah park. The villa sits on a large plot in a very quiet location and is a very well maintained property. The location is entry giving good access into the community and within walking distance to the Dubai British School and all the amenities of JP. There are 2 parks within a 5 minute walk to the villa. 
This villa is landscaped nicely and sits on a huge plot of 9500 sq.ft. It offers huge potential to create a "wow" factor from a unique landscaping and pool. On the ground level the villa enjoys an open plan large living and dining area that leads to the loggia overlooking a beautiful large lush green garden.  Kitchen is open plan and comes with built in appliances. Loggia has the potential to be upgraded to increase the built up area of the villa. Also has a separate pantry, a store, a laundry room and a maid's room.  
All 3 bedrooms are ensuite and with built in closet. Upstairs there is an additional Study/Family room.The villa is well maintained and in immaculate condition and vacant on transfer. This is a perfect family home close to the pavilion and school. 
Legacy Style
